Source.Name: libdiscid
Source.Summary: C library for creating MusicBrainz DiscIDs from audio CDs.
Source.Description: libdiscid is a C library for creating MusicBrainz DiscIDs from audio CDs. It reads a CD's table of contents (TOC) and generates an identifier which can be used to lookup the CD at MusicBrainz (http://musicbrainz.org). Additionally, it provides a submission URL for adding the DiscID to the database.
